subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Nnemkadi Ogwumike, a 6-foot-2 forward from Stanford, was picked No. 1 in the W.N.B.A. draft by the Los Angeles Sparks on Monday.
snippet: Nnemkadi Ogwumike, a 6-foot-2 forward from Stanford, was picked No. 1 in the W.N.B.A. draft by the Los Angeles Sparks on Monday.
